mapper.select: select b.bno, b.bname, b.btel, bm.bmno, bm.bmname, null as save_file_name from branch b left join branch_master bm on b.bmno=bm.bmno limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select bname, bno, btel, null as save_file_name from branch

select b.bno, b.bname, b.btel, b.baddr, b.bintro, b.barea, bm.bmno, bm.bmname, bf.save_file_name from branch b left join branch_master bm on b.bmno=bm.bmno left outer join branch_file bf on b.bno=bf.bno where b.bno = #{branchNo}
mapper.insert: insert into branch(bname, btel, baddr, barea, bmno, bintro) values(#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{area}, #{bmno}, #{intro})
mapper.update: update branch set bname=#{name}, btel=#{tel}, baddr=#{addr}, bintro=#{intro}, barea=#{area}, bmno=#{bmno} where bno=#{no}
